speaker: Verso
line: Brings back memories

speaker: Lune
line: Why?

speaker: Monoco
line: We lived on this mountain together for some time.

speaker: Sciel
line: Bromantic.

speaker: Gestral
line: A mountain of ice, invaded by fire. Neurons often resemble their environment. So… Where did their fire come from? And what are those creatures at the top of the mountain?

speaker: Verso
line: Remember those Stalacts, Monoco?

speaker: Monoco
line: Hmph.

speaker: Verso
line: Aren’t they… terrifying?

speaker: Verso
line: It’s been a while since I’ve been here.

speaker: Sciel
line: Verso…

speaker: Verso
line: We used to ski here… Before the Fracture.

speaker: Lune
line: Who’s going to upgrade our pictos now?

speaker: Maelle
line: I can do it.

speaker: Sciel
line: I don’t usually get this nervous, but… Ohhhhh, I’m nervous.

speaker: Verso
line: Yeah, I can see that.

speaker: Sciel
line: It’s not that I didn’t care before. I cared about the mission, but now…

speaker: Verso
line: Now, it’s personal.

speaker: Lune
line: It’s strange, watching her.

speaker: Verso
line: Maelle?

speaker: Lune
line: She has the power to remake our world. She’s a Paintress. But also our Maelle.

speaker: Verso
line: Yeah. She’s our Maelle.

speaker: Monoco
line: So. How are you going to win back their trust?

speaker: Verso
line: You’re really enjoying this, aren’t you?

speaker: Monoco
line: Can’t rely on good hair and charm anymore. So what’s the plan?

speaker: Monoco
line: Well. At least everyone’s still talking to you. That’s a start!

speaker: Verso
line: Maelle…

speaker: Maelle
line: I’m getting quite tired of people telling me to go home. So please, no more.

speaker: Verso
line: Fine. As you wish.

speaker: Maelle
line: They’re counting on me. I won’t abandon them. And I refuse to abandon you.

speaker: Esquie
line: Renoir is scary when he’s angry.

speaker: Verso
line: I guess he’s not that different from my father.

speaker: Esquie
line: Cousins.
